body: Why're blind people readin' this if they can't see the "Caution: Scat" label on the cover tho xD?
Although I'm not into scat nor anal, the hairy lady is way too hot, so I can't just ignore her. *sigh* ♡
I was only disappointed because I came for the gokkun tag
well...coprophagia...that's a word I didn't know existed...learn something new everyday....

I believe Hamrageddon is right. For a nutcracker, things like this type of doujin is certainly not that type and oftenly gross up the comments to make it toxic. 
What i suggest for this site is to add a warning before going into the book, that way people won't act like a stupid jerk and making other people to stop favoriting them.
i didn't even realize at first, but this wasn't a bad experience. Probably not my thing but this isn't that bad.
I like your attitude man, cheers to you

Just an advice :
You can fap if you put your mind to it... if you think and focus, ignore what you deem unfit and unwanted in certain scenario, you will earn a mindful nut.
